page.description: Get information (meta data and form data) for all form instances of the specified formId in the account associated with the API token.

argument.name: paginated
argument.description: true/false - indicates if the results should be paginated.

argument.name: pageNumber
argument.description: page number for which data is returned

argument.name: mode
argument.description: detailed/summary - determines if form meta data and data or just form instanceId and date created are returned

argument.name: resolveMediaFields
argument.description: determine if coded values for media fields are resolved to the actual URL on Amazon S3.

argument.name: getRecordCount
argument.description: if true, count of number of records is returned

argument.name: timestamp
argument.description: timestamp (format yyyy-mm-dd 0h:0m:0s). If blank all records are returned. If not blank only records > timestamp are returned. You can prefix with timestamp value with '>=' to return records greater or equal to the timestamp value

argument.name: fieldlist
argument.description: a list of the top level form fields that you want to return data from. if blank then data for all form fields are returned.

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: hightime
property.description: date of the last update to any record in the array (format yyyy-dd-mm 0h:0m:0s)

property.name: recordCount
property.description: number of records (1 if not paginated and getRecordCount is false)

property.name: pageCount
property.description: number of pages of data (1 if not paginated)

property.name: created
property.description: date when the form instance was created

property.name: timestamp
property.description: date when the form instance was last updated

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/GetFormInstancesArrayForFormId/value_of_formId?paginated=value%5fof%5fpaginated&pagesize=value%5fof%5fpagesize&pageNumber=value%5fof%5fpageNumber&mode=value%5fof%5fmode&resolveMediaFields=value%5fof%5fresolveMediaFields&getRecordCount=value%5fof%5fgetRecordCount&timestamp=value%5fof%5ftimestamp&fieldList=value%5fof%5ffieldList" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
